name: Bounce O Rama
description:
Bounce O Rama is a very simple game to play. All you need to do is tap the screen to make the character jump! Jumping helps the player avoid obstacles so you can keep going to try to get a higher score. I challenge you to try to get on the leader board! (Its not as easy as you think)

Features . . . . .

-Simple easy controls (Tap to jump and that's it!!)

-Endless runner

-Missile launchers

-Stunning graphics with amazing lighting!

-Leader Board
